song = {
'artist':'The Temptations',
'song':'Ball Of Confusion (That's What The World Is Today)',
'lyrics':'1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4

People moving out
People moving in
Why, because of the color of their skin
Run, run, run, but you just can't hide

An eye for an eye
Tooth for a tooth
Vote for me and I'll set you free
Rap on, brother,[...]',
'url':'http://lyrics.wikia.com/The_Temptations:Ball_Of_Confusion_%28That%27s_What_The_World_Is_Today%29'
}
lyrics:
1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4

People moving out
People moving in
Why, because of the color of their skin
Run, run, run, but you just can't hide

An eye for an eye
Tooth for a tooth
Vote for me and I'll set you free
Rap on, brother,[...]
